The chouchin-obake regains an amount of Hit Points equal to the amount of damage taken by the single creature that took the most damage.

items.name: Shadowbind
items.description:
Триггер: A creature attempts to leave the chouchin-obake's Lifewick Candle aura during a move action

Эффект: The chouchin-obake attempts to bind the creature using their own shadow. The triggering creature must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:26] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe] until its next turn.

items.name: Сжимать
items.description:
@Damage[2d8[void],1d6[fire]]{2d8 урона пустотой и 1d6 урона огнем}, простой спасбросок @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26|basic:true]{Стойкости}

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Constrict]

Chyzaedu.name: Chyzaedu
Chyzaedu.description: Chyzaedus' home world was consumed millennia ago by the Dominion of the Black via the manipulation of a black hole. Rather than accept destruction or fight back, the chyzaedus instead joined forces with their destroyers, seeing in them a greater purpose than mere world domination. Today, chyzaedus serve in a role akin to a priesthood for the Dominion and take a sinister interest in bringing their beliefs to new worlds, teaching ignorant dwellers the glory of pure entropic destruction. Much like the black holes they venerate, chyzaedus possess an eternal hunger for sustenance and knowledge alike-they can never be sated by either, yet they will never starve as long as there are mortals whose energy they can feed upon.
Chyzaedu.allSaves: бонус состояния +1 ко всем спасброскам от магии

items.name: Бонус состояния +1 ко всем спасброскам от магии
Alien Vestment
items.description:
The chyzaedu wears an eerie, alien layer of shimmering violet mucus that slithers and crawls over its flesh, but is hard as iron to the touch.

If a chyzaedu takes bludgeoning damage from a critical hit, its alien vestment is shattered—this reduces its AC to 27 and causes it to lose its resistance to mental and physical damage; it can grow a new alien vestment by concentrating for 1 hour.

items.name: Ecstatic Hunger
items.description:
30 feet. A chyzaedu gains sustenance by feeding upon the metabolisms of organic victims. A living creature that ends its turn in the aura must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:27] save.

Критический успех: Существо невредимо и временно иммунно на 24 часа.

Успех: The creature suffers a painful hunger pang, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg] for 1 round.

Провал: If possible, the creature spends its first 2 actions on its next turn eating or drinking (or spending actions to procure food or drink from its possessions or the surroundings, if necessary). The creature won't consume anything dangerous, but will eat things it normally has no appetite for.

Критический провал: As failure, but the creature will eat or drink dangerous consumables, such as poison or rotten food, if other food or drink are not immediately available. The creature must spend its first 2 actions each round consuming for as long as it remains in the chyzaedu's aura plus 1 minute thereafter, but the creature can attempt a new saving throw at the end of its turn each round to end the effect early.

Note: A DC was not provided for this ability by Paizo. The DC present here is a moderate DC for the creature level according to the Gamemastery Guide creature building Tables.

items.name: Проглотить целиком
items.description:
Средний, @Damage[(3d8+7)[bludgeoning]]{3d8+7 дробящего урона}, Разрыв 26

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SwallowWhole]

City Guard Squadron.name: Рота городской стражи
City Guard Squadron.description:
В большинстве населенных пунктов и городов Голариона есть гарнизон профессиональных стражников, в обязанности которых входит патрулирование улиц, оказание помощи нуждающимся гражданам и быстрое военное реагирование в случае кризиса. Стражники обычно действуют парами или небольшими группами, но когда возникает серьезная опасность, они собираются у ближайшей крепости, сторожевой башни или другого места сбора, а затем идут на поиски нарушителя. В качестве альтернативы, отряды стражи могут размещаться в важных местах города, таких как главные ворота, основная тюрьма или вход в замок правителя.

Отдельные стражники могут быть не особенно хорошо обучены или опытны, но в большом количестве они могут победить бандитов, диких существ, проскользнувших за городские ворота, или случайных пьяных огров. Группу городских стражей обычно сопровождает, и командует ими, один капитан, который ведет большую часть разговоров и отдает приказы отдельным стражникам. Члены этой роты городской стражи вместе тренировались выполнять простые тактические приемы, но не сложные маневры.
City Guard Squadron.descriptionGM:
Местные стражники

Изображенные здесь стражники — люди, вооруженные алебардами и арбалетами. Вы можете изменить эти детали, чтобы они соответствовали населенным пунктам в вашей игре, добавив признаки родословных, региональные языки и другие умения по мере необходимости, а также заменив их оружие на то, которое соответствует местной культуре.

items.name: Искать нарушителя
items.description: Городские стражи могут потратить 1 минуту на то, чтобы обозначить своей преследуемой жертвой 1 существо, для которого у них есть физическое описание. Они получают бонус обстоятельства +2 к Восприятию против своей жертвы.

items.name: Защита отряда
items.description:
Пороги: 50 (12 квадратов), 25 (8 квадратов)

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.TroopDefenses]

items.name: Арбалетный залп!
items.description:
Городские стражи достают или перезаряжают свои арбалеты, после чего дают залп дистанционной атакой.

Этот залп — @Template[type:burst|distance:10]{10-футовый взрыв} в пределах 120 футов, который наносит @Damage[3d8[piercing]]{3d8 колющего урона} (простой спасбросок @Check[type:reflex|dc:19|basic:true]{Рефлекса}). Когда численность городской стражи снижается до 8 квадратов или менее, их область залпа уменьшается до @Template[type:burst|distance:5]{5-футового взрыва}.

items.name: Опустить алебарды!
items.description:
от A до T

Частота: Раз в раунд.

Эффект: Городские стражи вступают в скоординированный ближний бой против каждого врага в пределах 10 футов с простым спасброском @Check[type:reflex|dc:19|basic:true]{Рефлекса}. Урон зависит от количества действий.

A @Damage[1d10[piercing]]{1d10 колющего урона} или @Damage[1d10[slashing]]{1d10 рубящего урона}

D @Damage[(1d10+7)[piercing]]{1d10+7 колющего урона} или @Damage[(1d10+7)[slashing]]{1d10+7 рубящего урона}

T @Damage[(1d10+10)[piercing]]{1d10+10 колющего урона} или @Damage[(1d10+10)[slashing]]{1d10+10 рубящего урона}

items.name: Передвижение отряда
items.description:
Когда городская стража @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Перемещается}, они в начале @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.OvqohW9YuahnFaiX]{Строятся} свободным действием (F) в область 20 на 20 футов (за вычетом любых недостающих квадратов), потом двигаются вплоть до своей Скорости.

Это работает так же как передвижение Исполинских существ; например, если любой из квадратов стражи попадает в сложную местность, то дополнительная стоимость передвижения применяется ко всей страже.

items.name: Городские преследователи
items.description: Городские стражи игнорируют @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.S55aqwWIzpQRFhcq.JournalEntryPage.cjD6YVPQpmYiOPdC#slozhnaya-mestnostь]{сложную местность} (но не особо сложную), вызванную толпами народа или передвижением по узким пространствам, таким как переулки.

Clacking Sea Skull Swarm.name: Морской клацающий рой черепов
Clacking Sea Skull Swarm.description:
Клубясь в бурлящих волнах обесцвеченной смерти, клацающие рои черепов возникают из останков десятков обезглавленных гуманоидов. Ужасный грохот черепов заставляет их жертву отвлекаться, даже если она пытается бежать в ужасе.

Рой черепов состоит из оживших масс черепов и челюстных костей, образующих ужасающую лавину неживой ярости. Большинство роев черепов неразумны, но некоторые из них сохранили остатки разума, сообразительности, осведомленности и даже прижизненных магических способностей, что в итоге приводит к появлению высокоинтеллектуального разума роя.
Clacking Sea Skull Swarm.descriptionGM:
Морские черепа

Чаще всего рои черепов встречаются среди руин, где извергаются огромные и неконтролируемые некромантические энергии, но еще они могут появляться и в водной среде, со скоплениями клацающих черепов мерфолков и морских дьяволов, диких черепов рыб и китообразных или даже оторванных акульих челюстей и клювов головоногих. Такие рои обладают Скоростью плавания, вместо Скорости полета или наземной Скорости.

Рои обезглавленных

Рои черепов тесно связаны с существами-нежитью, известными как обезглавленные, и по своей сути являются не более чем скоплением независимых обезглавленных, действующих согласованно для достижения общих целей. Помимо описанных здесь роев черепов, в любом регионе, страдающем от чрезмерного обезглавливания, можно встретить рои других видов обезглавленных с соответствующими умениями.

items.name: Взрыв костяных осколков
items.description: Когда ОЗ клацающего роя черепов снижаются до 0, он разрывается @Template[type:burst|distance:30]{30-футовым взрывом} нечистой энергии и костных осколков, нанося @Damage[2d12[piercing],2d12[void]]{2d12 колющего урона и 2d12 урона пустотой} (простой спасбросок @Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true]{Рефлекса}).

items.name: Зубной скрежет
items.description:
60 футов.

Клацающий рой черепов издает стрекочущую какофонию. Существо, попадающее в эту область или начинающее в ней свой ход, должно совершить успешный спасбросок @Check[type:will|dc:29]{Воли}, иначе будет в @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Замешательстве} на 1 раунд. При успехе, существо иммунно к зубному скрежету этого роя на 24 часа. Рой может прекратить или возобновить это умение свободным действием.

items.name: Пронзительный крик
items.description: Клацающий рой черепов издает ужасающий, болезненный крик, наносящий всем существам в @Template[type:cone|distance:30]{30-футовом конусе} @Damage[10d6[sonic]]{10d6 урона звуком} (простой спасбросок @Check[type:will|dc:29|basic:true]{Воли}). Существо провалившее этот спасбросок еще @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Напугано 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Напугано 2} при критическом провале). Рой не может снова использовать "Пронзительный крик" [[/br 1d4 #Перезарядка пронзительного крика]]{1d4 раунда}.

items.name: Глодающий рой
items.description: Каждый враг в пространстве роя получает @Damage[4d8[piercing]]{4d8 колющего урона} (простой спасбросок @Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true]{Рефлекса}).

Clacking Skull Swarm.description:
Клубясь в бурлящих волнах обесцвеченной смерти, клацающие рои черепов возникают из останков десятков обезглавленных гуманоидов. Ужасный грохот черепов заставляет их жертву отвлекаться, даже если она пытается бежать в ужасе.

items.name: Глодающий рой
items.description: Каждый враг в пространстве роя получает @Damage[4d8[piercing]]{4d8 колющего урона} (простой спасбросок @Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true]{Рефлекса}).

Clockwork Dragon.name: Clockwork Dragon
Clockwork Dragon.description:
Clockwork dragons are a marvel of clockwork design. These powerful masterpieces have the ability to fly, making them versatile and dangerous killers. A clockwork dragon's winding mechanism is more efficient than those of other clockworks, allowing it to partially reuse energy generated by flapping its wings. Creating a clockwork dragon requires not only an advanced understanding of clockwork design, but also a greater cache of rare resources, as its body requires solid reinforcement. As a result, most clockwork dragons have adamantine fortification. Creating a clockwork dragon without adamantine is entirely possible, though such dragons are typically smaller and more fragile.

Intricate, complex machines, clockworks are built with care by highly skilled engineers. Though their creation involves some amount of magic, they're primarily mechanical, packed with precision-tuned gears and springs working in concert.

The sturdy mainspring within a clockwork must be wound to provide the energy needed to power the device. Some larger clockworks contain a series of springs for different limbs that each need to be wound. A clockwork's crafter creates a unique metal key while building the clockwork; winding the clockwork usually involves inserting the key into the machine's back and turning clockwise. Larger clockworks require greater strength to turn the key, and typically have larger keys to allow for more torque-some even accommodating a team of winders rather than an individual. Programming a clockwork requires both the key and the knowledge to set the program correctly, information usually reserved for the clockwork's creator or owner.

items.name: Wind-Up
items.description:
1 week, @Check[type:thievery|traits:action:disable-a-device|dc:35], standby

For a clockwork to act, it must be wound with a unique key by another creature. This takes 1 minute. Once wound, it remains operational for the listed amount of time, usually 24 hours, after which time it becomes unaware of its surroundings and can't act until it's wound again. Some clockworks' abilities require them to spend some of their remaining operational time. They can't spend more than they have and shut down immediately once they have 0 time remaining. If it's unclear when a clockwork was last wound, most clockwork keepers wind all their clockworks at a set time, typically 8 a.m.

A clockwork that lists standby in its wind-up entry can enter standby mode as a 3-action activity. Its operational time doesn't decrease in standby, but it can sense its surroundings (with a -2 penalty to Perception). It can't act, with one exception: when it perceives a creature, it can exit standby as a reaction (rolling initiative if appropriate).

A creature can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6] to wind a clockwork down (with a DC listed in the wind-up entry). For each success, the clockwork loses 1 hour of operational time. This can be done even if the clockwork is in standby mode.

items.name: Self-Destruct
items.description:
A clockwork dragon must use this reaction unless specifically programmed otherwise by its creator.

Триггер: ОЗ заводного дракона снижены до 0.

Эффект: The dragon screeches to a stop and emits a steady, loud ticking sound. At the beginning of what would have been its next turn, the dragon explodes, dealing @Damage[12d10[piercing]]{12d10 колющего урона} damage in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:40] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:37|basic:true] save).

An adjacent creature can cancel the self-destruct sequence by succeeding at a @Check[type:thievery|dc:37|traits:action:disable-a-device] check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6].

items.name: Атака дыханием
items.description:
The clockwork dragon breathes a spray of flaming oil that deals @Damage[16d6[fire]]{16d6 урона огнем} damage in a @Template[type:cone|distance:40] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:37|basic:true] save).

Creatures that fail their saves are covered in burning oil and take @Damage[2d6[persistent,fire]]{2d6 продолжительного урона огнем}.

The clockwork dragon can't use Breath Weapon again for 2 rounds.

items.name: Драконье неистовство
items.description: The clockwork dragon makes two claw Strikes and one wing Strike in any order.

items.name: Spearing Tail
items.description:
The clockwork dragon attacks with the sharp point of its tail.

It makes a tail Strike against each creature in a @Template[type:line|distance:20], rolling the attack roll once and applying the result to each target. Any creature hit takes @Damage[4d6[bleed]]{4d6 урона кровотечением} ([[/r (2*4d6)[persistent,bleed]]] on a critical hit). This counts as two attacks for the dragon's multiple attack penalty.

Clockwork Mage.name: Clockwork Mage
Clockwork Mage.description:
A clockwork mage is a lethal blend of magic and machinery. Each of these clockworks is imbued with an arcane stone at its core that powers spells through the wand embedded in its chest.

Intricate, complex machines, clockworks are built with care by highly skilled engineers. Though their creation involves some amount of magic, they're primarily mechanical, packed with precision-tuned gears and springs working in concert.

The sturdy mainspring within a clockwork must be wound to provide the energy needed to power the device. Some larger clockworks contain a series of springs for different limbs that each need to be wound. A clockwork's crafter creates a unique metal key while building the clockwork; winding the clockwork usually involves inserting the key into the machine's back and turning clockwise. Larger clockworks require greater strength to turn the key, and typically have larger keys to allow for more torque-some even accommodating a team of winders rather than an individual. Programming a clockwork requires both the key and the knowledge to set the program correctly, information usually reserved for the clockwork's creator or owner.

items.name: Clockwork Wand
items.description:
The clockwork wand is a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.vJZ49cgi8szuQXAD]{Magic Wand} containing the last 2nd-rank innate spell the clockwork mage cast (the GM determines the spell randomly if it has not cast any eligible spells). The spells are placed within the wand while the mage is created, and the creator can substitute other arcane spells of the appropriate rank.

This baton is about a foot long and contains a single spell. The appearance typically relates to the spell within.

Активация: Сотворить заклинание

Частота: Раз в день, плюс перегрузка

Эффект: Вы @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Сотворяете заклинание} указанного ранга.

Требования для создания: Предоставить сотворение заклинания указанного ранга.

Note: To create a scroll or wand of a specific spell, drag the spell from the compendium or compendium browser into the inventory of a PC, NPC, or loot actor.

items.name: Wind-Up
items.description:
24 hours, @Check[type:thievery|traits:action:disable-a-device|dc:26], standby

For a clockwork to act, it must be wound with a unique key by another creature. This takes 1 minute. Once wound, it remains operational for the listed amount of time, usually 24 hours, after which time it becomes unaware of its surroundings and can't act until it's wound again. Some clockworks' abilities require them to spend some of their remaining operational time. They can't spend more than they have and shut down immediately once they have 0 time remaining. If it's unclear when a clockwork was last wound, most clockwork keepers wind all their clockworks at a set time, typically 8 a.m.

A clockwork that lists standby in its wind-up entry can enter standby mode as a 3-action activity. Its operational time doesn't decrease in standby, but it can sense its surroundings (with a -2 penalty to Perception). It can't act, with one exception: when it perceives a creature, it can exit standby as a reaction (rolling initiative if appropriate).

A creature can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6] to wind a clockwork down (with a DC listed in the wind-up entry). For each success, the clockwork loses 1 hour of operational time. This can be done even if the clockwork is in standby mode.

items.name: Clockwork Wand
items.description:
The clockwork mage uses a mechanical wand as a focus to channel magical energy. This wand is built into the clockwork mage's chest, with only the crystal at the end exposed. The mage can Interact to the remove the wand, or someone else can remove it with a @Check[type:thievery|dc:31|traits:action:disable-a-device] check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]. The clockwork mage becomes unable to cast any spells except cantrips while the wand is removed.

When removed, the clockwork wand is a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.vJZ49cgi8szuQXAD]{Magic Wand} containing the last 2nd-rank innate spell the clockwork mage cast (the GM determines the spell randomly if it has not cast any eligible spells). The spells are placed within the wand while the mage is created, and the creator can substitute other arcane spells of the appropriate rank.

items.name: Energize Clockwork Wand
items.description:
Частота: Раз в 10 минут

Эффект: The clockwork mage regains a spell it has already cast that day. It must spend 1 hour of its operational time, or 2 hours if the spell is 3rd rank or higher.

Clockwork Soldier.name: Clockwork Soldier
Clockwork Soldier.description:
These diligent machines guard their assigned posts tirelessly. A typical clockwork soldier stands 6 feet tall and consists of 500 pounds of metal and magic.

Intricate, complex machines, clockworks are built with care by highly skilled engineers. Though their creation involves some amount of magic, they're primarily mechanical, packed with precision-tuned gears and springs working in concert.

The sturdy mainspring within a clockwork must be wound to provide the energy needed to power the device. Some larger clockworks contain a series of springs for different limbs that each need to be wound. Larger clockworks require greater strength to turn the key, and typically have larger keys to allow for more torque-some even accommodating a team of winders rather than an individual. Programming a clockwork requires both the key and the knowledge to set the program correctly, information usually reserved for the clockwork's creator or owner.

It can't act, with one exception: when it perceives a creature, it can exit standby as a reaction (rolling initiative if appropriate).

A creature can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6] to wind a clockwork down (with a DC listed in the wind-up entry). For each success, the clockwork loses 1 hour of operational time. This can be done even if the clockwork is in standby mode.

items.name: Activate Defenses
items.description:
One of the soldier's external plates extends on a mechanical actuator to defend the soldier or an adjacent creature of the soldier's choice.

The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of the soldier's next turn, or until it is no longer adjacent to the soldier, whichever comes first. The soldier can have no more than one plate extended at a time.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.ya8r3IdzQ7QGNH8N]

variants.0: +17 для Разоружения, Захвата или избегания Разоружения

Clockwork Spy.name: Clockwork Spy
Clockwork Spy.description:
Engineers, technologists, and mechanically gifted wizards employ clockwork spies-tiny, spiderlike constructs capable of recording and playing back audio-to surreptitiously surveil their enemies or steal secrets from competitors. Their spindly bodies and delicate components make them unsuitable for combat; in fact, most builders construct clockwork spies with a self-destruct mechanism to ensure the spies' meddling can't be traced back to them.

Intricate, complex machines, clockworks are built with care by highly skilled engineers. Though their creation involves some amount of magic, they're primarily mechanical, packed with precision-tuned gears and springs working in concert.

The sturdy mainspring within a clockwork must be wound to provide the energy needed to power the device. Some larger clockworks contain a series of springs for different limbs that each need to be wound. A clockwork's crafter creates a unique metal key while building the clockwork; winding the clockwork usually involves inserting the key into the machine's back and turning clockwise. Larger clockworks require greater strength to turn the key, and typically have larger keys to allow for more torque-some even accommodating a team of winders rather than an individual. Programming a clockwork requires both the key and the knowledge to set the program correctly, information usually reserved for the clockwork's creator or owner.

items.name: Record Audio
items.description:
The clockwork spy records all sounds within @Template[type:emanation|distance:25]{25 feet} onto a small gemstone worth 1 gp embedded in its body. The clockwork spy can record up to 1 hour of sound on a single gemstone. Once it begins recording, it can't cease recording early, nor can it record onto a gemstone that already contains a recording.

Some clockwork spies contain multiple gemstones to allow for a series of recordings. Since clockwork spies are not intelligent, they must be given simple commands regarding when to start recording sounds. A clockwork spy can differentiate between different kinds of creatures but not between specific individuals.

The spy can start or stop playback of recorded sound by spending a single action. Removing a gemstone from or installing a gemstone into a clockwork spy requires a successful @Check[type:thievery|dc:14|traits:action:disable-a-device] check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]; on a failure, the gemstone is undamaged, but any recorded sounds are erased and the gemstone still can't be used to make another recording.

items.name: Wind-Up
items.description:
24 hours, @Check[type:thievery|traits:action:disable-a-device|dc:14], standby

For a clockwork to act, it must be wound with a unique key by another creature. This takes 1 minute. Once wound, it remains operational for the listed amount of time, usually 24 hours, after which time it becomes unaware of its surroundings and can't act until it's wound again.
